::Spears::

She looked at the ship for a moment.
"Say, when I arrived, my pod was damaged. It's main drive coil was 
damaged and it couldn't fly.  But the hardware for the drive systems 
was intact.  If you would be willing to go back with me to fetch it, 
we  can use my pod for parts. What do you say? Shall we?"
